title: 16-year-old shot on Neponset River bike path
content:
The shooting Friday night took place on a section of the path behind the Ryan Playground in Mattapan and near the Central Avenue trolley stop, state police said.
BOSTON - A 16-year-old boy was shot on the bike path along the Neponset River on Friday, State Police said.
The shooting was reported at 5:21 p.m. Friday on the path behind the Ryan Playground off 82 River St. in Mattapan, State Police said. The area is close to the Central Avenue trolley stop in Milton.
The victim was taken to Boston Medical Center for a gunshot wound and was expected to recover.
Since the shooting took place on Department of Conservation and Recreation property, State Police are responsible for crimes at that location have jurisdiction.
No arrests had been made as of Friday night and the investigation is ongoing, State Police said. The incident is being investigated by State Police detectives from Troop H with the assistance of the Suffolk County detective unit, firearms identification section and crime scene services.
